title: New Life Live: October 12, 2022
description:
Topics: OCD, Addictions, Anxiety, Isolation Hosts: Zach Matchett, Dr. Jill Hubbard, Dr. Jim Burns Caller Questions: What's the difference between an addiction and OCD? I have obsessive thoughts that are very disturbing.  I am 65yo and single; what should I do about my anxiety that is getting worse?  Suggested Resources: Take Your Life Back Finding Joy In the Empty Nest

content:encoded:
Topics: OCD, Addictions, Anxiety, Isolation
Hosts: Zach Matchett, Dr. Jill Hubbard, Dr. Jim Burns

Caller Questions:

  1. What’s the difference between an addiction and OCD? I have obsessive thoughts that are very disturbing. 
  2. I am 65yo and single; what should I do about my anxiety that is getting worse? 

Suggested Resources:
Take Your Life Back
Finding Joy In the Empty Nest
100 Days To Freedom from Fear and Anxiety
Conquer Worry and Anxiety

Subscribe to the NEW LIFE LIVE! podcast via iTunes or download the New Life Ministries App.
